job description:
Robert Half Management Resources is assisting a world-renowned Fortune 500 Company in Pittsburgh, PA to secure a Data Analyst for a critical project. The Data Analyst will work for the Legal Compliance team and will help to identify areas of improvement in fraud detection. The Data Analyst will help to support the Compliance team by increasing efficiency, improving feedback and data quality, and streamlining processes.

Job Duties of the Data Analyst:
  • Gather, analyze and interpret raw data from a variety of systems, including Spotfire, TIBCO, Excel, SQL and SharePoint
  • Verify data integrity by researching and communicating with process owners
  • Report data irregularities and anomalies to leadership and recommend solutions
Required Skills and Expertise
  • Strong analytical skills, with proven ability to process large datasets into meaningful information, identify patterns, problems and/or analyze opportunities
  • Exposure to data analysis/predictive analytics programming tools such as SQL, TIBCO, and Spotfire
  • Strengths in Excel and SharePoint
  • Ideal candidate will have performed in a fraud detection/compliance department previously
If you have the appropriate background and are interested in this or any other Accounting or Finance job in the greater Pittsburgh area, please send your resume to Michael.Bordonaro@rhmr.com or call 412.338.8790.
